metadata.title: SUSE-RU-2014:1083-1 -- Recommended update for apache2-mod_nss
metadata.description:
This update brings several improvements to apache2-mod_nss.
*
More TLS 1.2 ciphers have been added, including AES-GCM and Camelia ciphers. These can be selected by their tags:
o rsa_aes_128_sha256 o rsa_aes_128_gcm_sha o rsa_aes_256_sha256 o rsa_camellia_128_sha o rsa_camellia_256_sha o ecdh_ecdsa_aes_128_gcm_sha o ecdhe_ecdsa_aes_128_sha256 o ecdhe_ecdsa_aes_128_gcm_sha o ecdh_rsa_aes_128_gcm_sha o ecdhe_rsa_aes_128_sha256 *
The mod_nss.conf.in template was updated to include those ciphers. (bnc#863035)
*
VirtualHost settings in /etc/apache2/conf.d/mod_nss.conf is now externalized to /etc/apache2/vhosts.d/vhost-nss.template and not activated/read by default. (bnc#878681)
*
The Server Name Indication (SNI) extension was implemented.
*
Reading the pass phrase during start-up was improved. (bnc#863518)
